title: Cry
lyrics:
[Intro]
Mmmh
Mmmh
Mmmh
[Verse 1: Dua Lipa]
Do you remember the first time we met
You mentioned trust
You wanted to know everything
Even when it hurts
Deep down that's where the work is
Just let it come to the surface
I wish you'd open up
[Pre-Chorus: Dua Lipa]
And I know, and I know, yeah yeah
You pretend like it's under control, yeah yeah
But I know and you're bleeding
Do you know, do you know, yeah yeah
That I care, and like always
I'm right there
[Chorus: Dua Lipa]
In the blink of an eye
You can change it all right herе tonight
And all this time I never lеft your side
Is the issue by, it's ok to cry

[Verse 2: Pharrell]
Do you remember the last time we argue
What it was
I told I love you too much to just make it up
I don't want you to have a break down
I just want you to have a break through
‘Cause were not breaking up
[Pre-Chorus: Dua Lipa]
And I know, and I know, yeah yeah
You pretend like it's under control, yeah yeah
But I know and you're bleeding
Do you know, do you know, yeah yeah
That I care, and like always
I'm right there
[Chorus: Dua Lipa]
In the blink of an eye
You can change it all right here tonight
And all this time I never left your side
Is the issue by, it's ok to cry
[Post-Chorus: Pharrell]
‘Cause we all have been there before
Ignore those other people
Do it how you want to, do it how you want to
It's ok to cry

[Bridge: Dua Lipa]
C'mon, c'mon, jump up, jump up
Don't keep me waiting, don't keep me waiting, uh
C'mon, c'mon, jump up, jump up
Don't keep me waiting, uh
C'mon, c'mon, jump up, jump up
Don't keep me waiting, uh
[Chorus: Dua Lipa]
In the blink of an eye
You can change it all right here tonight
And all this time I never left your side
Is the issue by, it's ok to cry
[Post-Chorus: Pharrell]
‘Cause we all have been there before
Ignore this other people
Do it how you want to, do it how you want to
It's ok to cry
